edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.elGamalCommittedValue
Class SigmaElGamalCommittedValueProverInput

java.lang.Object
  edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.elGamalCommittedValue.SigmaElGamalCommittedValueProverInput
All Implemented Interfaces:
SigmaProverInput, ZKProverInput
public class SigmaElGamalCommittedValueProverInput
extends java.lang.Object
implements SigmaProverInput

Concrete implementation of SigmaProtocol input, used by the SigmaElGamalCommittedValueProver.

In SigmaElGamalCommittedValue protocol, the prover gets an ElGamal commitment message, the value committed x and the value r in Zq such that c1=g^r and c2 =h^r*x.

Author:
Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

r - random value used to commit.
